title: Inflation, Uncertainty, and Monetary Policy
content: Bord of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   3  September 26, 2017                                 Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System                         3  Figure 3 Why Has PCE Inflation Been Running below 2 Percent?  Note: Deviation of PCE inflation (4th quarter to 4th quarter) from 2 percent, total and portion attributable to specific factors.   Source:  Federal Reserve Board calculations using data from the BEA, BLS, CBO and SPF.
